structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 2, effective June 24, 2015; and ch. 112, sec. 1, effective April 2, 2015. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 19, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2002.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/24/2015). This statute was amended by 2015 Ky. Acts chs. 15 and 112, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
